diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,106 @@
+#include "ATen/native/cpu/TensorCompareKernel.h"

+
+namespace at { namespace native { namespace {
+
+template <typename scalar_t>
+bool _isnan(scalar_t val) {

+}
+

+  return std::isnan(val);
body:
sorry, i don't quite follow here. Could you please be more explicit "how to use `std::nan()`" to tell whether `val` is NaN or not?

this logic is in order to pass [test_max()](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_torch.py#L697) from `test_torch.py`, i was following [THTensor_(max)](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMoreMath.cpp#L74) basically.
